short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings back the classic red YouTube color scheme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension restores the original red theme of YouTube, replacing the new pink design with the classic red color. Itâ€™s ideal for users who prefer the old color scheme for a familiar and visually comfortable experience (like me).
